bug.author: favre49
bug.summary: Ensmallen documentation yet to be removed
bug.description: In mlpack/doc/tutorials, there exists tutorials for CNE and Optimizers, both of which have now been shifted to the ensmallen repository. Shouldn't they be removed?

comments.comment: Right, I think it makes sense to remove those files.
Agreed, if you want to open a simple PR to do that I think we should merge it. üëç
